decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (8373-01 Rev 04; Received 16/03/2016; 2050-01GATE-FENCE-DESIGN-PLAN; JNY8791-01 Rev D; Received 02/06/2016.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - Except in exceptional circumstances the gates are to remain open during normal business hours (8am - 6pm Mondays to Fridays).

Condition : 4 - Before the gates hereby permitted is first in use, details of the means to open and close the gates, including the type and location of equipment to be used shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a gate and boundary fences at the front entrance
